alert.note: Alert for Bath; Elliott; Fleming; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:29PM EDT until July 05 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Central Bath County in east central Kentucky... Northeastern Menifee County in east central Kentucky... Southeastern Fleming County in east central Kentucky... Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 129 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bruin to Lytten to Marshall, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bruin around 135 PM EDT. Little Sandy around 140 PM EDT. Young Springs around 145 PM EDT. Culver around 150 PM EDT. Crockett around 155 PM EDT. Moon around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Lakeview Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Elliott; Fleming; Menifee; Morgan; Rowan
